quote: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.   – Zig Ziglar
fact: It costs more to buy a new car today in the United States than it cost Christopher Columbus to equip and undertake three voyages to and from the New World.
joke: I thought my wife was joking when she said she'd leave me if I didn't stop signing "I'm A Believer"... Then I saw her face.
